briefTitle: Safety and Immunogenicity of Trivalent Subunit Inactivated Flu Vaccine Administered to Healthy Children and Adolescents 3 to 17 Years of Age
officialTitle: A Multi-center, Phase III, Randomized, Observer Blind Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability and Immunogenicity of a Trivalent Subunit Inactivated Flu Vaccine in Healthy Children and Adolescents 3 to 17 Years of Age
summary: This study will evaluate the safety and immunogenicity in healthy children and adolescents after one or two IM dose(s) of trivalent subunit inactivated flu vaccine.

primaryOutcome.measure: Comparison of Antibody Responses of Investigational TIV to Control Vaccine in Terms of the Percentage of Subjects Achieving Seroconversion
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Day 22 for non-naive/Day 50 for naive subjects
